TopicTitle: PlanetShine causing orbits and icons to appear all wobbly?

Articles.Content: So, I was playing with some visual mods the other day when I noticed in the mapview that orbits and ship icons would kind of shake around a little bit. It wasn't too much but it was definitely noticeable, enough for me to be annoyed with it. After some testing it seems the issue is coming from the planetshine mod. Any reason as to why this would be happening, or how to fix it? I'll see if I can get some sort of video to show what I'm talking about soon.
Hmm, it's been a while but isn't this a Kopernicus bug? I've definitely noticed the same thing myself.

Try to turn off AA in your KSP settings and see what happens. If it doesn't make a difference change them back.

I've read similar accounts but don't recall details. My vague recollection, with a fair chance I could be wrong, is that battling antialiasing settings between KSP, Scatterer, and other mods like like TUFX make the problem worse.

Are you running Scatterer? If so, this is from it's TAA, which can be turned off and replaced with SMAA in the spacecenter Scatterer menu. Personally, even though TAA is a little bugged, the fact of how much better it looks is a reason to leave it on. Hopefully this fixes your issue!
